full_summary:
======================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:**
Gasket and Preformed Packing Set

**Reference Number:** W8482-241724/A
**Publication Date:** June 14, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** July 14, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Amendment Date:** July 14, 2023

**Overview:**
The Department of National Defence invites bids for the procurement of Gasket and Preformed Packing Sets. This tender is for the supply of the specified items at CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.

**Items Required:**

1. **Gasket and Preformed Packing Set**
	* Part Number: 8377502
	* Alternate Part Number: 880-837-365
	* Quantity: 7
	* Unit of Issue: SE
	* Delivery Location: CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia
2. **Gasket and Preformed Packing Set**
	* Part Number: 8377502
	* Alternate Part Number: 880-837-365
	* Quantity: 7
	* Unit of Issue: SE
	* Delivery Location: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia

**Notice to Bidders:**
Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars.
* Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

**Tender Requirements:**
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**
Christopher Cauchi
christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca
(555) 555-5555

**Attachments:**
The tender notice and documents can be downloaded from:

* English: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6382/w8482-241724---rfp---en.pdf
* French: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6382/w8482-241724---rfp---fr_0.pdf

Please note that the tender is closed as the closing date has passed.   Thank you for your attention to this matter. 

 Note: I removed some irrelevant information to fit within the 400-word limit. I kept all the information from
